about_the_game:
This is the original soundtrack used in the epilogue section of "Craft The Mapcrafter:Gathering Magic Words."

作曲：KuroGameStudio
形式：44.1kHz(Wav 16bit /MP3 320kbps)

1.Stream Flow
2.Cloudy Sky
3.Heliocentric
4.Underscore
5.Starry Night Dolphin
6.Rumor
7.A Stroll
8.The Night Seeker
9.Fined Someones's Voice
10.Black Alley Hideaway
11.薫風
12.たゆたう
13.Nostalgic
14.Night Talk
